description:
* A media mix project based on an idea by http://anidb.net/cr3740 [Itou Kazunori].
http://anidb.net/ch16534 [Morisawa Yuu] is a precocious 10-year-old girl, whose parents run a crepe shop in Creamy ga Oka and who likes http://anidb.net/ch16528 [Toshio], a boy, three years older than her. One day, Yuu runs into aliens that have trouble with their damaged spaceship. In appreciation for helping them repair the spaceship, the aliens give Yuu a magical wand with one condition; she must keep it secret, otherwise she will lose the special power. She is also given two cats, http://anidb.net/ch16525 [Posi] and http://anidb.net/ch16523 [Nega], who are to watch over her while she has magical powers. In order to attract Toshio, Yuu decides to transform herself into an attractive 17-year-old girl! Yuu, with the 17-year-old figure, happens to be discovered as an idol singer and makes her debut as http://anidb.net/ch16526 [Creamy Mami]. But she never could have imagined that Toshio would start to be attracted to Creamy Mami, and not Yuu herself.
Note: The series pioneered the media mix strategy, with the real idol singer, http://anidb.net/cr8269 [Oota Takako] (Creamy Mami), debuting as an idol singer both in- and outside the story. It was the first of such series in Pierrot`s Magical Girls line-up.

REGULAR.description: Morisawa Yuu is a lively girl. One day, she catches sight of a mysterious light and chases after it. She discovers it`s a giant ship, and a pair of cats invite her aboard. There, a fairy named Pinopino explains that he`s gotten lost in a dream storm on his way home. With Yuu`s help, Pinopino finds his way. So, in thanks, he grants her a year of special powers!

Yuu, wanting to try out her powers, transforms and heads to Shinjuku to play. At the same time, Parthenon Production`s boss Tachibana Shingo is at his wits` end because the singer who is supposed to be appearing on his show, Ayase Megumi, is late. With no time to spare before filming, Tachibana pulls Yuu on stage to perform. She tells everyone her name is Creamy Mami, then disappears after the performance using magic.

Everyone in the entertainment world is in a tizzy about the appearance of the mysterious beauty, Creamy Mami. Tachibana is searching everywhere for her, but Yuu doesn`t want to be on TV. When she hears that her friend Toshio hopes to see Mami debut, Yuu decides to appear as Mami to tell Toshio she doesn`t want to. But when Mami shows up, Tachibana also appears, taking her away and forcing her to appear on TV "just this once".

titles.title: デビュー! デビュー!!

REGULAR.description: Yuu is very busy thanks to Creamy Mami, and she`s made to take an extra test after falling asleep in class. The disheartened Yuu extracts a promise from Toshio to help with her studying, but he changes his mind when he finds out that Mami will be performing on the Top Ten show. Even though she`d already turned down the performance, an annoyed Yuu agrees in order to please Toshio. But right as she goes to the studio, she discovers that the compact she uses to transform is missing!

titles.title: À la conquête du hit parade
スクランブル トップテン

REGULAR.description: Megumi`s suspicions are raised one day when she nearly discovers Mami transforming back into Yuu. To determine if Yuu is really Mami, Megumi locks Yuu up in the storeroom, and Yuu has to figure out a way to escape before she has to appear on film. Luckily, Toshio, who has come to see Mami, manages to set her free just in time for her to transform and get on stage. Megumi rushes back to check -- Yuu has to sneak back in time!

titles.title: あぶない!? マミの秘密!

REGULAR.description: Parthenon Productions plans to film a commercial featuring Mami in a river gorge. A local cave is known for a legend about a black buck, and when Toshio and Yuu, who arrived by train, go into the cave, they hear a voice coming from deep inside. Yuu discovers that the voice is coming from a stalagmite, and when she lifts a stone, a small black deer appears. When Yuu hurries to the filming site, numerous accidents occur, and Nega believes that the little deer is at fault.

A moving letter has arrived from a small boy about to undergo surgery. Tachibana thinks that it is a great opportunity to develop Mami`s image, but instead they discover that the patient is actually Zenigame Gotaro, a local mafia boss. Ken, Gotaro`s grandson, had lied in the letter so that he could get to see Mami. Tachibana is afraid that the situation is going to end in scandal for Mami, but she hatches a better plan...

A joint concert for Mami and Megumi has been planned for Isohama Beach. Yuu is worried about having to stay there for two nights, but after throwing a tantrum she convinces her parents to go. The night of the concert, Megumi plays a trick on Mami by suggesting a duet with an audience member: Yuu! Yuu is shocked, but manages to pull it off with a few tricks.

titles.title: 渚のミラクルデュエット

REGULAR.description: Yuu and company are on a break during their tour, and they go hiking in the woods. They get lost on their hike and decide to take a break, which is when they find a Western-style mansion. Yuu feels like someone is watching them as soon as she goes inside. Kidokoro tells the story of a banshee who searches for boys who resemble her lost love and takes them to another dimension. But it seems like the banshee is going after Toshio...
Nega gets separated from the others and is found by a little girl named Catherine. He helps her find a box which she buried a long time ago and goes on a little adventure!
